word: The present is a time of great peril to the people of God. God is leading out a people, not an individual here and there. . . .“Take heed, therefore, how ye hear” is an admonition of Christ. We are to hear for the sake of learning the truth, that we may walk in it. And again: “Take heed what ye hear.” Examine closely, “prove all things,”“believe not every spirit.”. . . This is the counsel of God; shall we heed it?
